sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { render } from 'react-dom'
import { Router, Route, Redirect, browserHistory } from 'react-router'
import ReactGa from 'react-ga'

import './css/main.scss'
// Public pages, do not require an active session
import Login from './components/login'
import Register from './components/register'
import RecoverPassword from './components/recuperar-contrasena'
import FirstPassword from './components/nueva-contrasena'
import ErrorPage from './components/error'
import Manteinence from './components/error/manteinence'
import About from './components/about'
import Changelog from './components/registro-de-cambios'
import Security from './components/security'

// Private pages, do require an active session
import App from './components/app'
import Dashboard from './components/app/views/dashboard'

import Credit from './components/solicitud-de-credito'

import RequestLeave from './components/request-leave'
import Reports from './components/app/views/reports'
import FacturaEnviada from './components/app/views/facturas-enviadas/ver'
import FacturasEnviadas from './components/app/views/facturas-enviadas'
import Downloads from './components/app/views/downloads'
import Accountants from './components/app/views/accountants'
import NewAccountant from './components/app/views/accountants/new'
import TaxableEntities from './components/app/views/taxableEntities'
import AddTaxableEntities from './components/app/views/taxableEntities/associate'
import NotifyTaxableEntities from './components/app/views/taxableEntities/notifications'
import InvoiceConcepts from './components/app/views/invoiceConcepts'
import NewInvoiceConcept from './components/app/views/invoiceConcepts/new'
import MyAccount from './components/app/views/editUser'
import EditUserGeneral from './components/app/views/editUser/general'
import EditUserNotifications from './components/app/views/editUser/notifications'
import EditUser from './components/app/views/editUser/general/editingForm'
import Suscription from './components/app/views/editUser/suscription'
import SuscriptionAddPayment from './components/app/views/editUser/suscription/paymentMethods/editingForm'
import PaymentLog from './components/app/views/editUser/suscription/paymentHistory'
import EditClient from './components/app/views/editClient'
import Documents from './components/app/views/documents'
import Income from './components/app/views/income'
import Expense from './components/app/views/expense'
import AccountingPeriods from './components/app/views/accountingPeriods'
import AccountingPeriodsDetails from './components/app/views/accountingPeriods/details'
import platformBlocked from './components/accountDisabled/platformBlocked'
import LayoutPlatformBlocked from './components/accountDisabled/layoutPlatformBlocked'
import Inventories from './components/app/views/inventories'
import InventoryReports from './components/app/views/inventories/reports'
import Activity from './components/app/views/inventories/activity'
import Products from './components/app/views/inventories/products'
import MassiveUpload from './components/app/views/inventories/products/massiveUpload.js'
import SingleUpload from './components/app/views/inventories/products/singleUpload.js'
import PreviewProducts from './components/app/views/inventories/products/preview.js'
import PayPremium from './components/app/views/payPremium'

// import CreditNote from './components/app/views/newInvoice/creditNote'
import Invoice from './components/app/views/newInvoice/invoice'
import Payroll from './components/app/views/newInvoice/payroll'
import NewDocument from './components/app/views/documents/new'
import ViewDocument from './components/app/views/documents/view'
import ViewInvoice from './components/app/views/viewInvoice'
import PayInvoice from './components/app/views/viewInvoice/payments'
import Notifications from './components/app/views/notifications'
import Bienvenida from './components/bienvenida'

// Facturación masiva
import MultipleInvoicing from './components/app/views/facturacion-masiva'
import MultipleInvoicingProcess from './components/app/views/facturacion-masiva/detalle'

// API
import API from './api'
import { unregister } from './registerServiceWorker'
import NotificationsActions from 'actions/notifications'
import SessionStore from './api/appStorage'
import logRocketInit from './logrocket'
import CreateAccount from './components/diagnostic/create'
import FiscalDiagnostic from './components/diagnostic/fiscalDiagnostic'
import DiagnosticInProcess from './components/diagnostic/diagnosticInProcess'
import DiagnosticReady from './components/diagnostic/diagnosticReady'
import ShowDiagnostic from './components/diagnostic/showDiagnostic'
import Plans from 'shared/plans'
import PaymentSuccessful from './components/app/views/payPremium/paymentSuccessful'
import CancelService from './components/app/views/payPremium/cancelService'

const notifyOnNewVersion = () => {
  if (window.__HAS_UPDATE_AVALIABLE__) {
    NotificationsActions.info(
      'Hay una nueva versión disponible. Click aquí para actualizar',
      'infinite',
      () => {
        window.location.reload()
      }
    )
    window.__HAS_UPDATE_AVALIABLE__ = false
  }
}

logRocketInit()

const $app = document.getElementById('app')

function verifyPermission () {
  const currentEntity = SessionStore.getCurrentEntity()

  if (currentEntity.access_allowed === false) {
    browserHistory.replace('/plataforma-bloqueada')
  }
}

const verifyEnabledFeatures = currentFeature => {
  const features = SessionStore.getFeatures()

  if (!features.some(feature => feature.key === currentFeature)) {
    browserHistory.replace('/dashboard')
  }
}

const routes = (
  <Route>
    {/* Temporary redirect all to Manteinence page */}
    {/* <Redirect from='/' to='/503' /> */}
    {/* <Redirect from='/ingresar' to='/503' /> */}

    {/* Public pages, do not require an active session */}
    {publicRoutes()}
    <Route component={LayoutPlatformBlocked}>{platformBlocked()}</Route>
    {/* Private pages, do require an active session */}
    <Route path='/bienvenida' component={Bienvenida} title='Bienvenido' />
    <Route
      component={App}
      onChange={notifyOnNewVersion}
      onEnter={verifyPermission}
    >
      <Route path='/dashboard' component={Dashboard} title='Dashboard' />
      <Route
        path='/documentos/editar/:id'
        component={NewDocument}
        title='Editar Documento'
      />
      <Route
        path='/documentos/ver/:id'
        component={ViewDocument}
        title='Documento'
      />
      <Route
        path='/documentos/nuevo'
        component={NewDocument}
        title='Nuevo Documento'
      />
      <Route path='/documentos' component={Documents} title='Documentos' />
      <Route
        path='/mi-contabilidad'
        component={AccountingPeriods}
        title='Mi contabilidad'
      />
      <Route
        path='/mi-contabilidad/:id/ver'
        component={AccountingPeriodsDetails}
        title='Mi contabilidad Detalles'
      />
      <Route
        path='/inventarios'
        component={Inventories}
        title='Inventarios'
        onEnter={() => verifyEnabledFeatures('inventory')}
      >
        <Route
          path='/inventarios/reportes'
          component={InventoryReports}
          title='Inventarios | Reportes'
        />
        <Route
          path='/inventarios/actividad'
          component={Activity}
          title='Inventarios | Reportes'
        />
        <Route
          path='/inventarios/productos'
          component={Products}
          title='Inventarios | Productos'
        />
        <Route
          path='/inventarios/productos/agregar-varios'
          component={MassiveUpload}
          title='Inventarios | Productos'
        />
        <Route
          path='/inventarios/productos/agregar-uno'
          component={SingleUpload}
          title='Inventarios | Productos'
        />
        <Route
          path='/inventarios/vista-previa'
          component={PreviewProducts}
          title='Inventarios | Productos'
        />
      </Route>

      <Route path='/ingresos' component={Income} title='Ingresos' />
      <Route
        path='/gastos/nomina'
        component={Expense}
        title='Gastos'
        tab='nomina'
      />
      <Route
        path='/gastos/regulares'
        component={Expense}
        title='Gastos'
        tab='regulares'
      />
      <Route
        path='/gastos'
        component={Expense}
        title='Gastos'
        tab='regulares'
      />
      <Route
        path='/facturas/ver/:id'
        component={ViewInvoice}
        title='Ver Factura'
      />
      <Route
        path='/facturas/pagar'
        component={PayInvoice}
        title='Pagar Factura'
      />
      <Route path='/facturas/nueva' component={Invoice} title='Nueva Factura' />
      {/* <Route
        path='/notas_de_credito/nueva'
        component={CreditNote}
        title='Nueva Nota de Crédito'
      /> */}
      <Route
        path='/facturas_de_nomina/nueva'
        component={Payroll}
        title='Nueva Factura de Nómina'
      />

      <Route
        path='/facturacion_masiva'
        component={MultipleInvoicing}
        title='Facturación Masiva'
        tab='regular'
      />
      <Route
        path='/facturacion_masiva/regular'
        component={MultipleInvoicing}
        title='Facturación Masiva'
        tab='regular'
      />
      <Route
        path='/facturacion_masiva/a_terceros'
        component={MultipleInvoicing}
        title='Facturación Masiva'
        tab='a_terceros'
      />
      <Route
        path='/facturacion_masiva/proceso/:tab/:id'
        component={MultipleInvoicingProcess}
        title='Facturación Masiva'
      />

      <Route
        path='/reportes'
        component={Reports}
        title='Reportes'
        tab='historico'
      />
      <Route
        path='/reportes/historico'
        component={Reports}
        title='Reportes'
        tab='historico'
      />
      <Route
        path='/reportes/iva'
        component={Reports}
        title='Reportes'
        tab='iva'
      />
      <Route
        path='/reportes/rubros'
        component={Reports}
        title='Reportes'
        tab='rubros'
      />
      <Route
        path='/reportes/rankings'
        component={Reports}
        title='Reportes'
        tab='rankings'
      />
      <Route
        path='/reportes/comportamientos'
        component={Reports}
        title='Reportes'
        tab='comportamientos'
      />
      <Route
        path='/contratar-premium'
        component={PayPremium}
        title='Contratar Premium'
      />
      <Route
        path='/pago-exitoso/:lastDigits'
        component={PaymentSuccessful}
        title='Contratar Premium'
      />
      <Route
        path='/cancelar-servicio'
        component={CancelService}
        title='Cancelar Servicio Premium'
      />
      <Route
        path='/notificaciones'
        component={Notifications}
        title='Notificaciones'
      />
      <Route
        path='/emails/ver/:id'
        component={FacturaEnviada}
        title='Ver Factura Enviada'
      />
      <Route
        path='/emails'
        component={FacturasEnviadas}
        title='Facturas Enviadas'
      />
      <Route path='/descargas' component={Downloads} title='Descargas' />

      <Route component={MyAccount} path='/mi-cuenta'>
        <Route
          path='/mi-cuenta/general'
          component={EditUserGeneral}
          title='Mi cuenta | General'
        />
        <Route
          path='/mi-cuenta/editar'
          component={EditUser}
          title='Mi cuenta | Editar'
        />
        <Route
          path='/mi-cuenta/notificaciones'
          component={EditUserNotifications}
          title='Mi cuenta | Notificaciones'
        />
        <Route
          path='/mi-cuenta/suscripcion'
          component={Suscription}
          title='Mi cuenta | Suscripción'
        />
        <Route
          path='/mi-cuenta/suscripcion/agregar-metodo-pago'
          component={SuscriptionAddPayment}
          title='Mi cuenta | Agregar Método de pago'
        />
        <Route
          path='/mi-cuenta/suscripcion/historial-pagos'
          component={PaymentLog}
          title='Mi cuenta | Historial de pagos'
        />
      </Route>

      <Route path='/solicitud-de-credito' component={Credit} />

      <Route
        path='/solicitar-baja'
        component={RequestLeave}
        page='Solicitar Baja'
      />

      <Route
        path='/entidades/:id'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='entidades'
        title='Editar Cliente'
        content='edit'
      />
      <Route
        path='/entidades'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='entidades'
        title='Editar Cliente'
        content='list'
      />
      <Route
        path='/sucursal/nueva'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='sucursales'
        title='Nueva Sucursal'
        content='edit'
      />
      <Route
        path='/sucursal/:id'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='sucursales'
        title='Editar Sucursal'
        content='edit'
      />
      <Route
        path='/sucursales'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='sucursales'
        title='Editar Cliente'
        content='list'
      />
      <Route
        path='/cuentas-de-pago'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='cuentas-de-pago'
        title='Cuentas de Pago'
        content='list'
      />
      <Route
        path='/cuenta-de-pago/nueva'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='cuentas-de-pago'
        title='Crear Cuenta Bancaria'
        content='edit'
      />
      <Route
        path='/cuenta-de-pago/:id'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='cuentas-de-pago'
        title='Editar Cuenta Bancaria'
        content='edit'
      />
      <Route
        path='/cliente/nuevo'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='clientes'
        title='Nuevo Cliente'
        content='edit'
      />
      <Route
        path='/cliente/:id'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='clientes'
        title='Editar Cliente'
        content='edit'
      />
      <Route
        path='/clientes'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='clientes'
        title='Editar Cliente'
        content='list'
      />
      <Route
        path='/nuevo/banco'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='cuentas-de-pago'
        title='Sincronización de cuentas automáticas'
        content='editSecond'
      />
      <Route
        path='/sincronizacion-finalizada'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='cuentas-de-pago'
        title='Sincronización de cuentas automáticas'
        content='finished'
      />
      <Route
        path='/smart-sync'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='cuentas-de-pago'
        title='Sincronización de cuentas automáticas'
        content='smartSync'
      />
      <Route
        path='/seleccionar/banco/:bank'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='cuentas-de-pago'
        title='Seleccionar banco'
        content='continue'
      />
      <Route
        path='/:bank/editar-cuentas/'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='cuentas-de-pago'
        title='Editar cuentas'
        content='edit-sync-accounts'
      />
      <Route
        path='/:bank/actualizar-token'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='cuentas-de-pago'
        title='Actualizar Token'
        content='update-token'
      />
      <Route
        path='/proveedores'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='proveedores'
        title='Editar Proveedor'
        content='list'
      />
      <Route
        path='/proveedor/nuevo'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='proveedores'
        title='Nuevo proveedor'
        content='edit'
        exact
      />
      <Route
        path='/proveedor/:id'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='proveedores'
        title='Editar Proveedor'
        content='edit'
      />
      <Route
        path='/empleado/nuevo'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='empleados'
        title='Nuevo Empleado'
        content='edit'
      />
      <Route
        path='/empleado/:id'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='empleados'
        title='Editar Empleado'
        content='edit'
      />
      <Route
        path='/empleados'
        component={EditClient}
        tab='empleados'
        title='Editar Cliente'
        content='list'
      />

      <Route
        path='/admin/contadores/editar/:accountantId'
        component={NewAccountant}
        title='Editar Contador'
      />
      <Route
        path='/admin/contadores/nuevo'
        component={NewAccountant}
        title='Nuevo Contador'
      />
      <Route
        path='/admin/contadores'
        component={Accountants}
        title='Contadores'
      />
      <Route
        path='/admin/entidades_fiscales/asociar/:entityId'
        component={AddTaxableEntities}
        title='Agregar Entidad Fiscal'
      />
      <Route
        path='/admin/entidades_fiscales/notificaciones/:entityId'
        component={NotifyTaxableEntities}
        title='Notificaciones'
      />
      <Route
        path='/admin/entidades_fiscales'
        component={TaxableEntities}
        title='Entidades Fiscales'
      />
      <Route
        path='/admin/rubros/editar/:entityId'
        component={NewInvoiceConcept}
        title='Editar Rubro'
      />
      <Route
        path='/admin/rubros/nuevo'
        component={NewInvoiceConcept}
        title='Nuevo Rubro'
      />
      <Route path='/planes' component={Plans} title='Planes Enconta' />
      <Route path='/admin/rubros' component={InvoiceConcepts} title='Rubros' />
    </Route>

    {/*
     * When requesting root route, redirects to Login component
     * which looks if a session is active in the browser and if so
     * will replace its own route for /dashboard
     */}

    <Redirect from='/' to='/ingresar' />
  </Route>
)

// Initializes Storages for the App
API.init(publicRoutes())

const onDev =
  (window.location.hostname === 'localhost' ||
    window.location.hostname === '0.0.0.0') &&
  process.env.API_SERVER !== 'https://api.enconta.com/'

// Configure Google Analytics
ReactGa.initialize(process.env.GA_TOKEN, { debug: false })

// If we are on dev, do not send the events
if (onDev) ReactGa.ga('set', 'sendHitTask', null)

// Updates the visited page in Google Analytics
function firePageView () {
  // Get the router object
  const { router } = this
  if (!router) return
  // Get current location with the current params
  const { location, params } = router
  let { pathname: currentLocation } = location
  // Convert param value into param name
  for (const param in params) {
    currentLocation = currentLocation.replace(params[param], param)
  }
  // Call GA library
  ReactGa.pageview(currentLocation)
}

render(
  <Router onUpdate={firePageView} routes={routes} history={browserHistory} />,
  $app
)
unregister()
